value.title: Download sample datasets and reports for Power BI and Excel
value.excerpt: Sample datasets and reports are great for learning and getting inspiration so in todays video I will share some resources you can download and use right away!  Link to resources: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/create-reports/sample-datasets#the-power-bi-samples-as-pbix-files and https://github.com/microsoft/powerbi-desktop-samples/tree/master/Sample%20Reports

value.title: Explain the different types of join/merge available in Power BI/ Excel
value.excerpt: Confused with all the join/ merge types options available in Power BI Desktop? No  worries, we explain all types in detail here. value.title: Get only the rows you need in Power Query from your files.
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to find the rows you need and import those instead of importing everything and then filtering them. value.title: Forecasting in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can forecast our data in Power BI. We will be discussing which visualization supports forecasting in Power BI. We can perform forecasting with a Line chart in Power BI.  In this video, we have taken an example of a real-life scenario to forecast our data.  Stay Connected

value.title: Are you backing up your Power BI Dataset???
value.excerpt: While Power BI is a SaaS service, backing up your dataset is still important. What if something was accidently deleted? How do you recover it? Patrick shows you how you can get a backup / restore process in place so you can sleep at night.  Backup/Restore PowerShell Script: https://guyinacu.be/backuprestorescript
